Plot: Difficult tale of poor, struggling South Carolinian mother & daughter, who each face painful choices with their resolve and pride. Bone, the eldest daughter, and Anney her tired mother, ...
Title: Bastard Out of Carolina
Actors: Jennifer Jason Leigh, Ron Eldard, Glenne Headly, Lyle Lovett
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 5 wins & 16 nominations.
